sentences.en: Betty : Don't disregard our traditions just because you're subversive.
sentences.cn: 不要以为你是个颠覆分子,就可以无视我们的传统.
凭上帝起誓, 惠普尔! 你无法无天!

sentences.en: Captain Black knew he was a subversive.
sentences.cn: 布莱克上尉断定他是颠覆分子.

sentences.en: He was engaged in subversive activities .
He's a subversive infidel rebellious alike against his God and his king.
sentences.cn: 他是反叛上帝又反叛君主的专搞颠覆的异教徒.

sentences.en: It has also pioneered the commercialisation of the subversive.
sentences.cn: 这座城市首开先河,引导颠覆分子归依商业.

sentences.en: Kara's Cupcakes is a deliciously subversive little enterprise.
sentences.cn: 是一间美味到颇具危险性的小企业.

sentences.en: The police is investigating subversive group in the student organization.
sentences.cn: 警方正调查学生组织中的搞颠覆阴谋的集团.

sentences.en: The young soldiers are now Being cleansed of subversive ideas.
sentences.cn: 目前正在清除年轻士兵阴谋颠覆的思想.

sentences.en: They are contaminating the minds of our young people with these subversive ideas.
sentences.cn: 他们这些颠覆作乱的思想是对我们年轻人的精神污染.

sentences.en: They cultivated a subversive alternative ethos ( Anthony Burgess )
sentences.cn: 他们培育了一种破坏性的交替的民族气质 ( 安东尼·伯吉斯 )

sentences.en: Was her speech subversive ( of law and order )?
sentences.cn: 她讲的话是否 ( 对法治 ) 是破坏性的?
她讲的话是否是破坏性的?

sentences.en: We speak that deadverse, subversive script!
sentences.cn: 我们说出那已死的诗句, 颠覆的脚本!

sentences.en: You are dead either being cooperative or subversive.

trans.tran_en: subversive ideas, activities etc are secret and intended to damage or destroy a government or an established system
someone who secretly tries to damage or destroy the government or an established system
